data.title: SoundtrackINFO: A Little Princess Soundtrack
data.meta_description: A Little Princess soundtrack, music by composer Patrick Doyle
data.text:
1. Ramayana A Morning Raga [2:03] 2. Children Running [0:53] 3. Cristina Elisa Waltz [3:03] 4. The Miss Minchin School For Girls [1:40] 5. Knowing You By Heart [2:32] ...see complete tracklist Soundtrack Q & A Q: Who sings the songs on this soundtrack? (from kaye in Alabama) A: Only one song has vocals, "Kindle My Heart." It appears twice on the soundtrack. The main character sings one version, while the composer's own daughter sings the other version. (thanks to OSTfan, Burlingame) add more info A: The back cover says about soloists: Catherine Hopper (Track 14), Abigail Doyle (Track 19), Liesel Matthews (Track 28... which contains another version of Kindle My Heart). (thanks to Bimbo, Zimbabwe) add more info Q: What about the lyrics? I want to get the lyrics. (from Willow in California) A: The lyrics are printed in the booklet that comes with the CD. There's a link up on this page to a place where you can buy the CD. When you buy the CD you are paying the songwriters for their work, so do it if you really cherish the songs! (thanks to Rachel, NYC) add more info Q: Who sings "Kindle My Heart" on this soundtrack? Two different people do in the movie. (from Billie in essex) A: Both versions are on the CD. Read the first question/answer up top. (thanks to Soundtrack.NUT) add more info Q: What is the name of the song being played on piano at the birthday party?

...from Kym in Ypsilanti,Michigan,USA (answer Kym's question) Feedback  Email this page to anyone.  Ask a question about the music in this movie.  Add music info heard in the movie but not listed on the soundtrack CD.  Add other info not listed above (trivial anecdotes, press quotes, recording anomalies, etc).
